description:
Today is Sakura`s birthday, and Tasuke decides to give her a four-leaf clover as a present. Just when he finally finds one, B.B.B. says nothing good has happened to him lately, and asks him to trade it for a pink colored pencil. Just like the legend of the Straw Millionaire, Tasuke`s birthday present for Sakura continues to change to something else, until at last... Will Sakura like the unbelievable present he ends up giving her?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: わらしべ!? たーすけ
